welcomeText: Welcome to YuviPep CRM Platform , Please login with your credentials to start using the platform.
forgotPasswordText: Enter the email address associated with your YuviPep account.
incorrectPassword: The current password entered is incorrect.
notSamePassword: New password and Confirm password are not matching
isOldPassword: New password is same as that of old password
emailSentText: New password has been sent to your email. Please use it to login to your account.
